user_query: My company is planning a corporate retreat in a coastal city. Can you provide me with healthcare mailing lists to invite medical professionals for on-site support? Also, give me guidelines on vaccinations for the trip and the Air Quality Health Index based on current levels of ground-level ozone, nitrogen dioxide, and fine particulate matter.

TaskList.description: Obtain a mailing list of healthcare professionals for on-site support at the corporate retreat.
Gather guidelines on necessary vaccinations for the trip to the coastal city.
Fetch current Air Quality Health Index (AQHI) data based on ground-level ozone, nitrogen dioxide, and fine particulate matter levels for the retreat location.
